Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Grand Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; above, band of lotus buds in faded added white outlines with added red centres; below, two white bands above frieze of lotus buds in white outline with red centres between red bands; below, alternating red and white tongues; exterior: five streaky brown bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1631) (phase 2)
